content.raw: I believe the failures were caused by pull request #1067 (see [tools/CMakeLists.txt](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/1067/remove-deprecations-for-gazebo-40/diff#chg-tools/CMakeLists.txt)), which was targeted to default after gazebo_3.0 had been branched. I've only seen the failures on the default branch. So I suppose we could target gazebo_3.1, but it was easier to target default to verify that the tests are fixed.
content.html: I believe the failures were caused by pull request #1067 (see tools/CMakeLists.txt), which was targeted to default after gazebo_3.0 had been branched. I've only seen the failures on the default branch. So I suppose we could target gazebo_3.1, but it was easier to target default to verify that the tests are fixed.
